duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, and execute the vision of the cybersecurity framework and solutions to deliver services to clients.
Work with management team to drive scalable, reliable, and secure solutions across the cybersecurity practice.
Familiarity with industry standard frameworks and compliance requirements such as NIST, ISO, GDPR, HIPAA, etc.
Lead all cybersecurity focused tasks and engagements, promoting information and cybersecurity internally and with clients.
Advise on emerging vulnerabilities and risks, recommending enhancements and proactive security measures.
Provide technical leadership for all information and cybersecurity platforms and technologies.
Oversee administration, configuration, and maintenance of cybersecurity technologies, ensuring maximum uptime and protection.
Execute regular technical risk assessments of systems and infrastructure, selecting new cybersecurity platforms and solutions.
Lead threat hunting, detection, and response in containing cybersecurity incidents, and provide coaching and mentoring to team members.
Support sales team to produce solutions for customers, build and manage strong relationships with distributors and partners.
Work with clients and the team to support quoting and procurement requests, and establish strong relationships with business units and customers.

education_certification.credential: 4-year degree in technology/engineering or related services, with 3+ years managing a team of information/cybersecurity professionals, and 5+ years of experience in information technology and cybersecurity.
Preferred: CISSP (or similar), strong understanding of DevOps information and security best practices.
